title: GWPP Melamine Plastic Rectangular Serving Tray, Set of 3 Assorted Sizes. for Indoor Restaurant or Outdor Picnic and Camping. (Bule-White Grid) T9298
features: Melamine plastic serving tray, rectangle design with rounded corners for carry cups, platter or other tableware.
Rectangle melmac plastic tray is unbreakable and can be use on indoor restaurant serving or outdoor picnic.
For all occasions: Serving in restaurant, at home, wedding, BBQ, thanksgiving dinner, summer patio party, christmas party, etc..
Mixing Size: (1)Small for 13-1/8" x 10" x 3/5" ;(1)Medium for 15-3/8" x 11-2/5" x 3/4" ;(1)Large for 17" x 12-3/5" x 3/4"
description: Package:One of Small Tray ：13-1/8"（length） x 10"（width）x 3/5"（deep） One of Medium Tray：15-3/8“（length）x 11-2/5"（width） x 3/4"（deep） One of Large Tray：17“（length）x 12-3/5"（width） x 3/4"（deep）

Features of melamine products: The quality is safety for put food on it. Smooth, beautiful and generous.  Melamine dinnerware look like ceramic but unbreakable, and you don't worry about breakage on the way to camper or travel.  Melmac plastic tableware is BPA free. The quality is safe for put food on it. Smooth, beautiful and generous.  DO NOT using for microwave.

Melamine (Melmac) tablewares are oil resistant and organic solvents.  They are not easy to be dyed. Suitable for most detergent available in the market. Melmac products manufacture by high pressure and temperature, safety temperature less than 158℉. Non breakable dishware, not easy to damage, durable, and can be used for many times, re-use greatly saving operating costs. Melamine products is healthy non-toxic tasteless, Approvel for US FDA standards ensure all product is safety for using. Can be used in dishwashers, but microwave ovens, ovens should not be used, electronic disinfection cabinet should be used with caution. The melamine products are more environmentally friendly than the old porcelain products and do not cause any pollution when placed in the natural environment.   About cleaning methods: Washing should be placed at the top of the dishwasher. Dishwasher safety for setting less than 158℉. When you clean tableware, please use soft cleaning tools are suggested to be used for cleaning, such as sponges, cotton cloth, etc. DO NOT use steel ball and other harder washing tools to clean the Melamine dinnware.  Cusomize Product Design Service:  You can order special tableware for your family or resautant, justsend message to us.
